name: Moonie
description:
Loosely inspired by the fairy tale "The Buried Moon",
Moonie is a game about collecting three moonstones, each of them containing a splinter of Moonie's power, as fast as possible so he can return to the sky and fulfil it's duty of scaring away all the evils of the night.
Before you do, however you must stay wary as to not waste the precious moonlight - attacking continuously drains moonlight and the only way of recovering it is to bring a recovered moonstone to the altar!

Controls:
WASD - Move around.
E - Interact with the moonstones and the altar
LMB - Attack

WARNING:
You may encounter a bug that crashes the game when attacking enemies. Although we weren't able to reproduce it in release version of the game, due to its seemingly random nature, we can't rule out the possibility of it simply not happening during our limited playtesting time. We apologize for the inconvenience.

---
Submission for Godot Wild Jam #48
